Gloria Hotels & Resorts – New Partner of Solheim Cup 2015
Gloria focusses on the largest golf tournament for ladies.
Whether high-class events of the PGAs of Europe, the World Amateur Team Championships (WATC) or the International Team Championships – Gloria Hotels & Resorts in Belek on the Turkish Riviera are among the most popular venues for renowned golf events. Even outside of the premises the modern Turkish hotel group supports numerous golf events worldwide. Now also the largest golf cup for the ladies, the Solheim Cup 2015, which will be held the first time on German grounds in St. Leon-Rot (Baden-Württemberg).
The promotion of golf for all ages, females and males is an important matter for the owners of Gloria Hotels & Resorts. Next to numerous renowned events on the hotel´s own golf course, which is the largest in Turkey, Gloria Hotels & Resorts are en route at worldwide popular golf tournaments all over Germany. Now also as a new partner of the Solheim Cup 2015, that will inspire the international golfing world in the Golf Club St. Leon-Rot from 18th to 20th September 2015.
“As the new official partner of the Solheim Cup, we look forward to support the dedicated female golfers. Our professional expertise in the area of golf is being reflected also in our preferred partnership with the PGAs of Europe, who is using our premises regularly”, says Öznur Özdemir Özaltin, CEO of Gloria Hotels & Resorts. “The Solheim Cup as a major sporting event, being a counterpart of the Ryder Cup, proves clearly, that golf is equally favored by both genders and that even the best twelve female golfers from Europe and the USA can create excitement in the battle for the popular trophy”.
The destination Belek, approximately 30 kilometers away from Antalya airport, is one of the fastest growing golf regions of the world. Gloria Hotels & Resorts with their Gloria Golf Club belong to the first-movers, when it comes to golf in Turkey. The 45-hole golf course, the largest course of Turkey, is one of the most popular venues for international golf events, e.g. the World Amateur Championships were held here. Since August 2014 Gloria Hotels & Resorts are also the official home base of the PGAs of Europe and the International Team Championship (ITC).
The Gloria Hotels & Resorts are bookable via all renowned tour operators.
Source:- IAGTO
